li.label: field medic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} used to function as a field medic. {PAWN_pronoun} has learned how to quickly apply first aid to fallen allies, sometimes too fast.

li.label: surgeon
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a trained surgeon. {PAWN_pronoun} has undergone training in the fine arts of cutting people up and stiching them back together, hopefully fixing stuff that needed it midst the cutting.
